name: Patrol Against Space Sabotage
description:
Blurb -

Fight against the wretched aliens in the everyday battles of PASS [Patrol Against Space Sabotage] as they use everything in their arsenal to endlessly fend off the evil species from Planet Disguzk i.e. a purple metallic dog, a green bulb & a rotten red donut!

-------------------------------------------- Controls -

Arrow Keys - Move left/Right.
X - Shoot horizontal bullets
Z - Shoot vertical missiles
Esc - Pause Menu

-------------------------------------------- Before You Play -

-> This is my first game made using unity & at heart is a space invaders clone, please honestly give your feedback on the game.
-> You can only shoot one bullet at a time i.e a new bullet will not spawn until the previous one de-spawns [same with missiles].
-> "Auto Replay" is a feature that makes you start playing the game again upon dying automatically skipping the game-over screen & then the title screen entirely [ideal for high-score marathons], this feature can be toggles on/off in the title-screen & pause menu.
-> For the best experience, please download the game below.
